file_content.text: Darth Vowrawn. Overseer Tremel. And even Lord Rathari.
Do not be cross, my lord. Vowrawn pulled me out of hiding to bear witness, nothing more.
Darth Vowrawn. Lord Rathari.
Darth Vowrawn. Overseer Tremel. I thought you were in hiding.
I'm pleased you have not forgotten me, my lord. Yes, Darth Vowrawn found me and bade me come forward.
My old master is about to learn I've been defying him since the beginning.
Baras will be surprised.
I've been in hiding long enough. If I am to die, it should be with you.
Glad you're still alive, old man. Are you well?
How are you, Tremel?
I have been a man with no country.
Eskella came to me and died at my hand. But it was Baras who killed her.
I can't wait to watch Baras pay for what he's done.
What is the point of Tremel's presence?
Why is this overseer here?
It will unnerve Baras to see that his control of you and his realm have always been less than he believed.
Lord Rathari found me and expressed his wish to be here. A passionate young man.
I told you I'd have your back when you faced Baras. I want to hear him scream.
Your wish is about to come true.
It's your lucky day.
Leave the fighting to me, Rathari.
Stay out of it.
As you say. Always.
Rathari's presence will show the rest of the Dark Council that you have Sith support.
I don't want Rathari anywhere near me.
Get him out of here.
I will make sure he stands meekly in the background, but it will be beneficial for the Dark Council to see that you have support.
I'm here. Let's waste no time.
Baras has called a special session of the council to make his claim as the Emperor's Voice official. I'm fashionably late.
Your former master and the most powerful Darths in the galaxy await. The play is yours.
I will lead the way. I want to be the first thing Baras sees.
Follow me.
By all means.
I've never felt more alive.
It's exhilarating.
If I am to die, it should be face-to-face with my greatest enemy.
It's a good day to face death.
Lead the way.
You're here! The anticipation fills my veins with fire. I feel a hundred years younger.
I can't wait to see Darth Baras's face when I introduce you to the Dark Council.
We can end the suspense right now.
Then let us delay no more.
Baras is a master of control. He won't betray even a tremor.
He'll ruin the moment.
Don't spoil the dream, my friend.
Get your holocam ready. Preserve it for posterity.
Be sure to make a recording.
Ha! If only we could sell tickets.
Meet me in the ante chamber to the Dark Council. No one will dare obstruct you on the way there.
